Class Vector2Converter

Namespace
osu.Framework.IO.Serialization
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A type of Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConverter that serializes only the X and Y coordinates of a osuTK.Vector2.

public class Vector2Converter : JsonConverter<Vector2>

reader JsonReader

The Newtonsoft.Json.JsonReader to read from.

Type of the object.

The existing value of object being read. If there is no existing value then null will be used.

The existing value has a value.

The calling serializer.
